name: api_editor_AssetBundle
description: API for accessing the content of AssetBundle files.

properties.name: isStreamedSceneAssetBundle
properties.description: Return true if the AssetBundle contains Unity Scene files

properties.name: Contains
properties.description: Check if an AssetBundle contains a specific object.

properties.name: GetAllAssetNames
properties.description: Return all Asset names in the AssetBundle.

properties.name: GetAllScenePaths
properties.description: Return all the names of Scenes in the AssetBundle.

properties.name: LoadAllAssets
properties.description: Loads all Assets contained in the AssetBundle synchronously.

properties.name: LoadAllAssetsAsync
properties.description: Loads all Assets contained in the AssetBundle asynchronously.

properties.name: LoadAsset
properties.description: Synchronously loads an Asset from the AssetBundle.

properties.name: LoadAssetAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously loads an Asset from the bundle.

properties.name: LoadAssetWithSubAssets
properties.description: Loads Asset and sub Assets from the AssetBundle synchronously.

properties.name: LoadAssetWithSubAssetsAsync
properties.description: Loads Asset and sub Assets from the AssetBundle asynchronously.

properties.name: Unload
properties.description: Unloads an AssetBundle freeing its data.

properties.name: UnloadAsync
properties.description: Unloads assets in the bundle.

properties.name: GetAllLoadedAssetBundles
properties.description: Get an enumeration of all the currently loaded AssetBundles.

properties.name: LoadFromFile
properties.description: Synchronously loads an AssetBundle from a file on disk.

properties.name: LoadFromFileAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously loads an AssetBundle from a file on disk.

properties.name: LoadFromMemory
properties.description: Synchronously load an AssetBundle from a memory region.

properties.name: LoadFromMemoryAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously load an AssetBundle from a memory region.

properties.name: LoadFromStream
properties.description: Synchronously loads an AssetBundle from a managed Stream.

properties.name: LoadFromStreamAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously loads an AssetBundle from a managed Stream.

properties.name: RecompressAssetBundleAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously recompress a downloaded/stored AssetBundle from one BuildCompression to another.
